name: Jenkins
description: Jenkins, build great things at any scale

projects.project_name: AI-Powered Chatbot for Quick Access to Jenkins Resources
projects.summary: Develop an AI-based chatbot to provide users with quick and intuitive access to Jenkins documentation, plugins, and community resources.

projects.project_name: Backend code refactoring for Infra Statistics
projects.summary: Significantly refactor backend code for the Infra Statistics feature.
Use alternative tooling with Gatsby and Antora to build the Jenkins static site and provide versioned Jenkins documentation.

projects.project_name: Domain-specific LLM based on actual Jenkins usage using ci.jenkins.io data
projects.summary: Develop a web app using an existing open-source LLM model with Jenkins usage data for domain-specific knowledge.

projects.project_name: Improving Tekton Client Plugin for Jenkins
projects.summary: Enhance the Jenkins Tekton Client Plugin for better cloud-native CI/CD interoperability and user experience.
Enhance the Jenkins Plugin Modernizer tool and increase integrations with the Jenkins ecosystem.

projects.project_name: Revamping jenkins.io website Success Stories feature
projects.summary: Revamp the 'Success Stories' feature on the jenkins.io website, improving tooling and UI/UX experience.

projects.project_name: Swagger / OpenAPI standardization for Jenkins REST API
projects.summary: Standardize documentation of the Jenkins REST API using Swagger or OpenAPI specifications.

projects.project_name: Android and/or iOS tutorials in official documentation
projects.summary: Add Android and/or iOS tutorials to the official Jenkins documentation.

projects.project_name: Pipeline documentation improvements - Phase 2 and Phase 3
projects.summary: Enhance navigation and implementation of the Pipeline Steps Reference.

projects.project_name: Improving Jenkinsfile Runner abilities and GitHub Actions
projects.summary: Investigate and improve the Jenkinsfile Runner's capabilities and its interaction with GitHub Actions.

jina_response:
Title: GSoC 2025 Project Ideas

URL Source: https://www.jenkins.io/projects/gsoc/2025/project-ideas/

Markdown Content:
![Image 1](https://www.jenkins.io/images/gsoc/jenkins-gsoc-logo_small.png)

This page aggregates project ideas for Google Summer of Code 2025. Refer to the Jenkins Google Summer of Code page [](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/gsoc/)for more information about this project and applications..

Below you can find project ideas that have been proposed for this year. New ideas may be proposed by interested mentors or GSoC contributors, such as new features in the core or "write a plugin for MY\_TOOL\_OR\_SERVICE". Project ideas without potential mentors will be considered, though applicants may need to work with the community and GSoC org admins to find mentors. To add a new project idea, see: [proposing project ideas](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/gsoc/proposing-project-ideas/) .

### Accepted ideas

The following list contains the project ideas that fully match the Jenkins project idea standard. The scope of these ideas is understood and we don't normally expect deep changes. All ideas have quick-start guidelines and newbie-friendly issues referenced. We welcome contributors to join the mentor teams and invite GSoC contributors to submit project proposal applications related to these ideas.

| Project | Category | Skills to study/improve |
| --- | --- | --- |
| [**AI-Powered Chatbot for Quick Access to Jenkins Resources**](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/gsoc/2025/project-ideas/ai-powered-chatbot-for-quick-access-to-jenkins-resources/)  
Develop an AI-based chatbot to provide users with quick and intuitive access to Jenkins documentation, plugins, and community resources..  
**Potential Mentor(s):**[![Image 2: Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/krisstern.png) Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/krisstern/) | Plugins | Natural Language Processing (NLP), Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Jenkins Plugin Development, Machine Learning |
| [**Backend code refactoring for Infra Statistics**](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/gsoc/2025/project-ideas/backend-code-refactoring-for-infra-stats/)  
To significantly refactor backend code for the Infra Statistics.  
**Potential Mentor(s):**[![Image 3: Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/krisstern.png) Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/krisstern/)[![Image 4: Bervianto Leo Pratama](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/berviantoleo.jpg) Bervianto Leo Pratama](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/berviantoleo/)[![Image 5: Phillipp Glanz](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/TheMeinerLP.jpg) Phillipp Glanz](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/themeinerlp/) | Infra | Groovy, Backend-frontend Integration, Code Refactoring, Infra / DevOps Processes |
| [**Complete build retooling of jenkins.io**](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/gsoc/2025/project-ideas/complete-alternative-jenkins-io-build-retooling/)  
Using alternative tooling with Gatsby and Antora to build the Jenkins static site and provide versioned Jenkins documentation.  
**Potential Mentor(s):**[![Image 6: Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/krisstern.png) Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/krisstern/)[![Image 7: Bruno Verachten](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/gounthar.png) Bruno Verachten](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/gounthar/)[![Image 8: Kevin Martens](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/kmartens27.jpeg) Kevin Martens](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/kmartens27/)[![Image 9: Rajiv Ranjan Singh](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/iamrajiv.jpg) Rajiv Ranjan Singh](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/iamrajiv/) | Tools | Web development, AsciiDoc, Static website tooling, Documentation, Website retooling |
| [**Domain-specific LLM based on actual Jenkins usage using ci.jenkins.io data**](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/gsoc/2025/project-ideas/domain-specific-LLM-based-on-jenkins-usage-using-ci.jenkins.io-data/)  
To develop a web app using an existing open-source LLM model with Jenkins usage data collected for domain-specific Jenkins knowledge to be fine-tuned.  
**Potential Mentor(s):**[![Image 10: Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/krisstern.png) Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/krisstern/)[![Image 11: Harsh Pratap Singh](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/harsh-ps-2003.jpg) Harsh Pratap Singh](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/harsh-ps-2003/)[![Image 12: Shivay Lamba](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/shivaylamba.png) Shivay Lamba](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/shivaylamba/) | Infra | Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, React.js, LLM, AI/ML, Jenkins, Ollama, LangChain, UI, Infra statistics, Data Analytics |
| [**Improving Tekton Client Plugin for Jenkins**](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/gsoc/2025/project-ideas/improving-tekton-client-plugin/)  
Enhance the Jenkins Tekton Client Plugin to improve cloud-native CI/CD interoperability and user experience.  
**Potential Mentor(s):** [Vibhav Bobade](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/waveywaves/)[![Image 13: Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/krisstern.png) Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/krisstern/) | Plugins | Java, Kubernetes, Tekton, Jenkins |
| [**Improving Plugin Modernizer**](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/gsoc/2025/project-ideas/plugin-modernizer-improvements/)  
Improving the Jenkins Plugin Modernizer tool and provide integrations with Jenkins ecosystem.  
**Potential Mentor(s):**[![Image 14: Bruno Verachten](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/gounthar.png) Bruno Verachten](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/gounthar/)[![Image 15: Valentin Delaye](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/jonesbusy.png) Valentin Delaye](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/jonesbusy/)[![Image 16: Sridhar Sivakumar](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/sridamul.jpg) Sridhar Sivakumar](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/sridamul/)[![Image 17: Phillipp Glanz](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/TheMeinerLP.jpg) Phillipp Glanz](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/themeinerlp/) | Tools | OpenRewrite, Data structure (Trees) and visitor pattern, Java, Plugin hygiene and migration |
| [**Revamping jenkins.io website Success Stories feature**](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/gsoc/2025/project-ideas/revamping-jenkins-io-website-success-stories-feature/)  
To revamp jenkins.io website's Success Stories feature to update both tooling and UI/UX experience with new design.  
**Potential Mentor(s):**[![Image 18: Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/krisstern.png) Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/krisstern/)[![Image 19: Bervianto Leo Pratama](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/berviantoleo.jpg) Bervianto Leo Pratama](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/berviantoleo/) | UI/UX | Website development, UI/UX design, Geospatial data visualization, Gatsby.js and React.js |
| [**Swagger / OpenAPI standardization for Jenkins REST API**](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/gsoc/2025/project-ideas/swagger-openapi-for-jenkins-rest-api/)  
Standardizing Jenkins REST API documentation using Swagger or the OpenAPI specifications.  
**Potential Mentor(s):**[![Image 20: Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/krisstern.png) Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/krisstern/)[![Image 21: Bruno Verachten](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/gounthar.png) Bruno Verachten](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/gounthar/)[![Image 22: Rajiv Ranjan Singh](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/iamrajiv.jpg) Rajiv Ranjan Singh](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/iamrajiv/)[![Image 23: Bervianto Leo Pratama](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/berviantoleo.jpg) Bervianto Leo Pratama](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/berviantoleo/)[![Image 24: Phillipp Glanz](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/TheMeinerLP.jpg) Phillipp Glanz](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/themeinerlp/) | Tools | Swagger / OpenAPI standardization, REST API, Documentation, Automation, Java |

### Draft project ideas

In the following list, you can refer to draft project ideas, which are currently under review. The scope of such ideas may change during the discussions, but the idea is accepted in principle. You are welcome to comment on the draft and join the project as a mentor. If you are a GSoC contributor, it is also fine to explore and apply to the draft project ideas.

| Project | Category | Skills to study/improve |
| --- | --- | --- |
| [**Android and/or iOS tutorials in official documentation**](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/gsoc/2025/project-ideas/android-or-ios-tutorial-pages/)  
Adding Android and/or iOS tutorials for Jenkins in the official documentation.  
**Potential Mentor(s):**[![Image 25: Bruno Verachten](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/gounthar.png) Bruno Verachten](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/gounthar/)[![Image 26: Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/krisstern.png) Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/krisstern/) | Documentation | Documentation, Java, YAML, Android / iOS development, Command line tools |
| [**Pipeline documentation improvements - Phase 2 and Phase 3**](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/gsoc/2025/project-ideas/further-pipeline-documentation-improvements/)  
Improving the navigation and implementation of the Pipeline Steps Reference.  
**Potential Mentor(s):**[![Image 27: Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/krisstern.png) Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/krisstern/)[![Image 28: Bervianto Leo Pratama](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/berviantoleo.jpg) Bervianto Leo Pratama](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/berviantoleo/) | Documentation | Documentation, Web development, Jenkins plugins |
| [**Improving Jenkinsfile Runner abilities and GitHub Actions**](https://www.jenkins.io/projects/gsoc/2025/project-ideas/improving-jenkinsfile-runner-abilities-and-github-actions/)  
To investigate the current state of the Jenkinsfile Runner project and to improve its abilities as well as those of GitHub Actions when used in conjunction.  
**Potential Mentor(s):**[![Image 29: Valentin Delaye](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/jonesbusy.png) Valentin Delaye](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/jonesbusy/)[![Image 30: Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/krisstern.png) Kris Stern](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/krisstern/)[![Image 31: Bervianto Leo Pratama](https://www.jenkins.io/images/avatars/berviantoleo.jpg) Bervianto Leo Pratama](https://www.jenkins.io/blog/authors/berviantoleo/) | Tools | Java, Jenkinsfile Runner, Docker, GitHub Actions |

### Ongoing discussion

These proposals are suggestions from the mailing list, which have not been published as project ideas yet. The feasibility is yet to be defined, and the idea may be dismissed depending on the feedback. Everyone is welcome to participate in the discussion and join as a potential mentor.

| Project | Category |
| --- | --- |
